"manhandled exception" haha sorry - unhandled exception!

STEP 6
when u install your firewall should ask for permission say NO, if you have given permission by mistake click start type firewall click firewall, choose advanced options, go thru list find blackops2 remove. done

@aremic - 7zip instructions: Right click on file 1 -> 7-Zip -> select "Extract to...."  This will merge the files into the one folder you want.  Learn before you bitch or buy the game if you can't even research such simple things.

@ all who can't play - I had the exact same issues you're all probably experiencing.  I don't know if it's specifically this repack that fixes the issues, or the procedures he provides, but it works.  Please follow his steps.
